mapper.select: SELECT info.* from shop_coupon_info info INNER JOIN shop_coupon co ON info.coupon_id=co.id where info.delete_status=0 and DATE_FORMAT(co.coupon_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d') and info.status = #{status}

SELECT u.login_name,co.coupon_amount,info.* from shop_coupon_info info LEFT JOIN shop_coupon co ON info.coupon_id=co.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_account u ON (u.uid=info.user_id and u.account_type=2) where info.delete_status=0 and coupon_id=#{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY info.add_time DESC
mapper.sql: id, add_time, delete_status, coupon_sn, status, coupon_id, user_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from shop_coupon_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into shop_coupon_info (id, add_time, delete_status, coupon_sn, status, coupon_id, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into shop_coupon_info
id,
add_time,
delete_status,
coupon_sn,
status,
coupon_id,
user_id,

mapper.update:
update shop_coupon_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_status = #{record.deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
coupon_sn = #{record.couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coupon_id = #{record.couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update shop_coupon_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{record.deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, coupon_sn = #{record.couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_id = #{record.couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update shop_coupon_info
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
coupon_sn = #{couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update shop_coupon_info set add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, coupon_sn = #{couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
